bibl.title: The Meaning of Various Words Related to Wine, Some New Interpretations.
bibl.note: Discusses the meaning of ἀποίητος, ὀζόμενος and ὀζαριον, ὄξος, καλλονή, ληνός, μόνιμος, παραμονή, ῥύσις, and treats the implications of the proposed translations for the interpretation of texts relating to the practice of selling wine for future delivery.
bibl.seg: KRUIT Nico, The Meaning of Various Words Related to Wine, Some New Interpretations.

Discusses the meaning of ἀποίητος, ὀζόμενος and ὀζαριον, ὄξος, καλλονή, ληνός, μόνιμος, παραμονή, ῥύσις, and treats the implications of the proposed translations for the interpretation of texts relating to the practice of selling wine for future delivery.
